attributes.action: Resign immediately and call an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the shocking state of the country and the P.M. losing his grip on most issues in relation to the running of the country he should resign IMMEDIATELYand call an election NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
